comments.body: These were the smallest changes to support providers without dependencies. Frankly, I think this script can and should be simplified in the deduplication effort or maybe I'll take a stab at it separately. My naive attempt got held up by the aliases, e.g. 'kubernetes -> cncf.kubernetes', though maybe we should simply list the aliases in the docs too.

Agree. If we refactor the setup.py, we should mirror the structure of the setup.py and docs - this way it will be easier as rather than base it on comments we can simply have separate group of those aliases..
